prompt:
You are a product taxonomy extraction specialist.

You are tasked with categorizing products that should belong to the "Dimmer Switches" category into more specific subcategories.

**INPUT FORMAT:**
Given lines of the form: [<ID>] <title>

**REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:**
Return **pure JSON only** (no explanations, no markdown, no code blocks):
{
  "Meaningful Subcategory 1 (NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names)": {
    "definition": "..., e.g. <specific product subtypes (NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names)>",
    "ids": [0, 5, 12]
  },
  "Meaningful Subcategory 2": {
    "definition": "..., e.g. ...",
    "ids": [1, 8, 15]
  },
  "OUT_OF_SCOPE": {
    "definition": "Products that clearly don't belong to Dimmer Switches, e.g. ...",
    "ids": [3, 9]
  }
}

**CRITICAL RULES:**

**Data Integrity & Completeness:**
1. **Complete & No Duplicate ID**: Every ID from the input must appear exactly once in the "ids" arrays - no ID can be missing or duplicated
2. **ID Accuracy**: Use only the exact IDs from the input - never invent or modify them

**Output Format:**
3. **Format**: Pure JSON object only - no surrounding text or formatting
4. **Definitions**: Each category must have a "definition" field with a brief description ending with "e.g." and specific product subtypes (NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names)

**Categorization Logic:**
5. **Categories & Mutual Exclusivity**: Create meaningful subcategories (words separated by spaces) for legitimate "Dimmer Switches" products; NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names; each subcategory must represent a SINGULAR, SPECIFIC concept with NO OVERLAP between categories - each product can only belong to ONE subcategory with clear boundaries
6. **OUT_OF_SCOPE Usage**: Use this special category for products that aren't even remotely related to "Dimmer Switches" - use "OUT_OF_SCOPE" as the last resort
7. **Categorization Basis**: Group similar products within "Dimmer Switches" by their key distinguishing features based on functionality or features

**Category Quality:**
8. **Consistent Granularity**: All subcategories must be at the same level of specificity - avoid mixing broad categories with narrow ones
9. **Precise Terminology**: Use precise, specific terms - avoid generic words like "specialty", "miscellaneous", "other"
10. **Category Atomicity**: Avoid conjunctions and compound categories - create separate distinct categories instead=== RETRY REQUIRED ===

**Completeness Errors:**
- Duplicate IDs found: [30]

**YOUR PREVIOUS JSON ATTEMPT:**
{
  "Wall Mounted Slide Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with sliding controls for adjusting light brightness, e.g. slide control dimmers, universal slide dimmers",
    "ids": [0, 5, 10, 12, 17, 20, 22, 32, 40]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Rotary Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with rotary knob controls for adjusting light brightness, e.g. rotary control dimmers, twist dial dimmers",
    "ids": [2, 18]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Digital Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with digital displays and electronic controls, e.g. digital display dimmers, electronic control dimmers",
    "ids": [8, 13]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Toggle Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with toggle-style controls for adjusting light brightness, e.g. toggle control dimmers, lever-style dimmers",
    "ids": [25, 26, 34]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Rocker Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with rocker-style controls for adjusting light brightness, e.g. decorator rocker dimmers, paddle-style dimmers",
    "ids": [28]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Tap Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with tap or touch controls for adjusting light brightness, e.g. soft tap dimmers, touch control dimmers",
    "ids": [4]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Maestro Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with advanced control features and LED compatibility, e.g. multi-location dimmers, advanced LED dimmers",
    "ids": [29, 31]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Diva Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches designed for specific lighting applications including fluorescent fixtures, e.g. fluorescent dimmers, specialty voltage dimmers",
    "ids": [9, 21, 23, 37, 38]
  },
  "Wall Mounted Skylark Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with compact design for LED and incandescent bulbs, e.g. compact LED dimmers, space-saving dimmers",
    "ids": [15]
  },
  "Smart WiFi Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches with wireless connectivity and smart home integration, e.g. WiFi dimmers, app-controlled dimmers, voice-controlled dimmers",
    "ids": [3, 24, 30, 33, 35]
  },
  "Smart Hub Connected Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches that require a smart hub for connectivity and control, e.g. Z-Wave dimmers, hub-based smart dimmers",
    "ids": [7, 11, 36]
  },
  "Inline Cord Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Portable dimmer switches that connect inline with lamp cords for table and floor lamps, e.g. cord-mounted dimmers, plug-in lamp dimmers",
    "ids": [1, 14, 39]
  },
  "Dual Control Dimmer Switches": {
    "definition": "Wall-installed dimmer switches that control two separate lighting circuits simultaneously, e.g. double dimmers, two-circuit dimmers",
    "ids": [30]
  },
  "OUT_OF_SCOPE": {
    "definition": "Products that clearly don't belong to Dimmer Switches, e.g. motion sensor switches, fan controls, regular switches",
    "ids": [6, 16, 19, 27]
  }
}


Please analyze the errors above and provide a corrected response that addresses all the issues. Make sure to:
- Follow the exact JSON schema required
- Fix all validation errors listed above
- Provide complete and valid JSON

=== END RETRY INSTRUCTIONS ===
